title: Nerf illaoi
body: As i'm a quite high elo player, i'm facing some serious problems playing vs this champion. Every time i see this champion in game i feel very tilted before it even starts. Altogether, I came to the conclusion and i want you to do something to change this situation. I'm waiting for your response to my request, thank you.

replies.body:
How much did you pay for boosting?

If you think Illaoi needs nerfs, you're still Bronze.

Holy shit whats will all these illaoi threads today. Just looked you up. You play adc and plenty of them are mobile. Illaoi sucks against vayne, she sucks balls against lucain, and jhin should never be in her range of without someone else there to either help him dodge the e or body block it.  

DODGE E AND WIN. IF SHE ULTS THEN USE YOUR MOBILITY OR FLASH TO IMMEDIATLY GET OUT OF HER RANGE.  She can't chase so once ulti wears off just re-engae and kill her.

Edit: lol you lost to illaoi as a teemo, thats pretty funny
When she came out I would just run away when she ulted ,and then saw her in play for sometime,  maybe now she is resurfacing
